channel.title: How to create your own custom items in a client
channel.description: ok my question is how do i create custom items and then how do i configure them into my client, also when i try to equip 1 of my custom items it goes into attack place when its a plate body how do we change it to make it go into the plate body place?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 09, 2008, 02:58:27 PM[/size][hr]HELLO?
